channel.title: ImperialPk 474 - New & Stable - Includes Cache & Client
channel.description:
[b]Basic Features -[/b]
- All wilderness levels complete. - all wilderness multi-way combat zones complete. - Skulling system complete. - Almost perfected combat completely - Barrelchest anchor with special attack - Poisoning re-added - Starting location for spawn server set - Special attacks whilst dead - Blue hit marks on granite maul special attack (for hits higher than 0.) - Eating while dropping dead - Magic base set-up - All regular-spell teleports added - Wielding an item doesn't make the old item appear in first slot anymore - Autocasting base
[b]Some Media -[/b]
[IMG]http://img192.imageshack.us/img192/8696/gloryu.png[/img] [IMG]http://img99.imageshack.us/img99/5316/cookingready.png[/img] [IMG]http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/3424/prayer2l.png[/img] [IMG]http://img37.imageshack.us/img37/3488/cluescrolls.png[/img] [IMG]http://img696.imageshack.us/img696/1206/dialogue.png[/img]
[b]Server Download -[/b]
http://www.mediafire.com/?iycnmv2y0jm
[b]Client Download -[/b]
http://www.mediafire.com/?g3man0ymmdt
[b]474 Cache -[/b]
http://www.mediafire.com/?mwmnu0motjn

item.title: ImperialPk 474 - New & Stable - Includes Cache & Client
item.dc:creator: @ImperialPkScape ImperialPkScape
item.description:
@ImperialPkScape wrote:

Basic Features -

  • All wilderness levels complete.
  • all wilderness multi-way combat zones complete.
  • Skulling system complete.
  • Almost perfected combat completely
  • Barrelchest anchor with special attack
  • Poisoning re-added
  • Starting location for spawn server set
  • Special attacks whilst dead
  • Blue hit marks on granite maul special attack (for hits higher than 0.)
  • Eating while dropping dead
  • Magic base set-up
  • All regular-spell teleports added
  • Wielding an item doesn’t make the old item appear in first slot anymore
  • Autocasting base

Some Media -
